email_chain.subject: Rate Request - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 12,000 MT of fertilizer from Santos to Durban under CIF terms. Could you provide a rate estimate and vessel availability for this shipment? We are targeting a laycan of April 10-15.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer you the vessel MV OCEAN BREEZE, which is currently available for your laycan. The starting freight rate is USD 42.50 per metric tonne under CIF terms. The vessel has a DWT of 65,000 and an LOA of 225 meters.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Peter Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate of USD 42.50 seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider revising it to USD 40.00 per metric tonne? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rates and provide the vessel's certificates?

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

I understand your concern regarding the rate. After reviewing, I can offer a revised rate of USD 41.00 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. I will send over the vessel's certificates shortly.

Let me know if this revised rate is acceptable.

Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

The revised rate of USD 41.00 is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking and send over the necessary documents for review. We will also need the laytime details and confirmation of the laycan.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your confirmation. The booking is now secured. The laycan remains April 10-15, and the laytime is 72 hours. I have attached the vessel's certificates and the booking confirmation for your records.

Best regards,
Peter

[ATTACHMENTS: vessel_certs.pdf, booking_confirmation.pdf]
